name: Chain Roll-Action
description:
Submission for the GMTK Jame 2022 "Roll of the Dice".

A fast-paced dice matching puzzle game with a twist! Each six-sided die rolls when clicked, match three or more sides to score points. 

Be careful though, every time matched dice disappear they have a chance to gain increasingly hectic effects. Match the right dice to chain effects for even more chaos!

Made using Unity, Aseprite, Audacity and Beepbop
